events.message: I am reporting an auto accident that occurred yesterday morning involving my car and another vehicle. The collision caused significant damage to my front bumper and left headlight.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial incident description and related documents submitted by the claimant.
An agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will be your point of contact throughout the claims process.
We have officially acknowledged your claim submission and confirmed receipt of all initial accident details and police report attached.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, repair estimates, and any eyewitness statements to assist with the investigation.
The claimant has submitted requested photographs, repair bills, and statements which are now under review for claim processing.
An investigation has commenced to verify the details of the auto accident, including vehicle damage and third-party liability.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and damage estimates aligning with the claimant’s submitted documentation.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the investigation outcome covering repair costs and rental reimbursement.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the timely handling of the claim.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department after final review of all documentation and feedback.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to the claimant’s registered bank account for vehicle repairs.
The claim file is now closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair completion from the claimant.
The records of this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance with company policies.
